description:
Bancacy describes itself as a smart commodity asset backed by smart contracts, decentralized oracles, and the Ethereum Blockchain. Liquidity is issued without intermediaries. Bancacy's smart contracts automate and convert the traditional buyer and seller trades.

name: Bancacy
